summary: @hatsume mei pls make baku some kind of headphones or ear plugs we dont need more screaming
question: @hatsume mei pls make baku some kind of headphones or ear plugs we dont need more screaming
answer: Mmmmmmmm hatsume is sweet but I wouldn’t trust her near anyone’s ears. Besides he needs hearing aids first. Putting ear plugs in first would just result in more screaming im sure.

I try to make everything gender neutral so everyone can enjoy! Profile picture colored by my friend Neve.

question: B with Bakugou please?
answer: The best memory he has of you is every memory he has. He would never choose one, even if he won’t admit it due to embarrassment.

blog.description: Hi my name is Mailla and Aoyama Yūga is my son.

summary: Kirishima : Nah you’re more manly Tetstutestu : Lol nah bro, it’s you who’s more manly... Kirishima : Actually, the most...
body:
Kirishima : Nah you’re more manly

Tetstutestu : Lol nah bro, it’s you who’s more manly…

Kirishima : Actually, the most manliest of all is him. *points at Aoyama*

Tetsutetsu : *sheds a manly tear* omg you’re right.

Aoyama, brushing his hair : Ov0? Quoi?

blog.name: boku-no-hero-dorks
blog.title: Boku no Hero Academia Imagine
blog.description: This is a imagine blog where I write scenarios for the bnha dorks! AskBox{CLOSED} // RULES (NSFW welcome!) // {My Haikyuu&KnB Imagine Blog}

summary: HEYYYYY BBY THANK YOU FOR ANOTHER ASK BLOG ❤ let's start this off with a little love for the most relatable teacher in UA,...
question: HEYYYYY BBY THANK YOU FOR ANOTHER ASK BLOG ❤ let's start this off with a little love for the most relatable teacher in UA, Aizawa. Scenario for when Aizawa falls in love with the new guy in school. How does he react? How does he confess?
answer:
You are all really in love with this weird cutie I guess? So much asks about him! And thank you for requesting sweetie!!

ATTENTION: IF YOU DON’T WANT TO READ A TEACHER X STUDENT FANFICTION, DO NOT CONTINUE TO READ.

——————————————————————————————-

Was it it the look in his eyes? The way they sparkled whenever he was around him? The raven haired teacher didn’t know, but what he did know was that the boy was something special, something that attracted him the way nobody has ever before. Nevertheless, that was exactly what bothered him so damn much. The cold, not-giving-a-damn Aizawa and being in love? How was that even possible?

Little did he know, that not only he was interested, but (Name) was as well, just (Name) was so much better at handling it.

“Aizawa! Aizawa!” as he slowly snapped out of his daydream about this cute new guy, he tried his best to answer. “Yes, All Might, can you go now? I need some good old quality sleep.” Which was just half true, all that he needed was more time to figure all this confusing, so-called feelings out.

The poor male couldn’t even look him in the eyes without trailing back to his lips, like two different poles constantly attracting each other. However, he had already made up his mind, if he wants to get these annoying and tiring thoughts and anxieties out of his head, he had to confess.

—————————————(Name)’s POV—————————————–

When (Name) opened his locker a note fell out of his locker with a poorly written “Meet me on the roof” on it, he didn’t have to think twice who wrote it. Struggling not to laugh too hard, he held the letter to his heart and smiled silly for two minutes straight. (Dear me I spelled straight wrong three times in a row. Being stupidly gay be like)

One step, two steps, three steps. Were there always so many steps to get up to the roof? And why didn’t his heart seem to calm down at all? The feeling of dizziness was dominating all the other emotions for a moment and he actually felt like throwing up right here and now. Still, he knew precisely what that dizziness meant, it just showed how much he cared for Aiwaza and for once in his whole life, he was not sure if someone likes him back or just wants to stay friends, well, this was the only time he really cared.

A ray of sunshine glistened on his face when he open the door to the roof with shaky hands. There he was. The person he adored so much. The person who lights up the oh-so-dark Mondays. 

Standing there with a bouquet of flowers in his hands, Aizawa had a slight blush that tinted his cheeks in a rosy tone. Not being able to look him in the eyes Aizawa trailed his eyes slowly from the floor to the breathtaking green ones he adores so much.

“Hey (Name)”, he managed to somehow get out. “You’ve been running through my thoughts a lot lately and…”, he inhaled some air before continuing, “I think I really like you, I know we can’t do this, but you are going to graduate soon a-”.

(Name) didn’t take two seconds to make up his mind and straight up hugged him firmly. The surprise couldn’t be wiped of Aizawa’s face, it was priceless and for this small moment, the teacher smiled warmly, because he finally knew what it meant to really fall in love.

“Aizawa-san you are really adorable when you’re shy, do you know that?”, (Name) giggled, before burying his face in his chest.

Nobody was allowed to say that to him, except him, his loved one could wake him up while he was sleeping and Aizawa wouldn’t even care.

summary:
A bunch of fools: bakugou sweats a lot bc of his quirk so he’d smell really bad
Bakugou stans, aka a bunch of intellectuals:...
body:
A bunch of fools: bakugou sweats a lot bc of his quirk so he’d smell really bad

Bakugou stans, aka a bunch of intellectuals: actually his sweat is made of nitroglycerin which smells like burnt caramel so he’d smell really really good

reblog.comment:
A bunch of fools: bakugou sweats a lot bc of his quirk so he’d smell really bad

Bakugou stans, aka a bunch of intellectuals: actually his sweat is made of nitroglycerin which smells like burnt caramel so he’d smell really really good
